# Create Products Page for Octodeco

Create a products page at `app/products/page.tsx` for **Octodeco**, an online sticker company.

## Requirements

Display all stickers from `public/images/products/`:
- Professortocat_v2.png
- Terracottocat_Single.png
- bouncercat.png
- cherryontop-o-cat.png
- dinotocat.png
- femalecodertocat.png
- inflatocat.png
- jetpacktocat.png
- justicetocat.jpg
- manufacturetocat.png
- mona-the-rivetertocat.png
- oktobercat.png
- original.png
- red-polo.png
- skatetocat.png
- sponsortocat.png
- surftocat.png
- vinyltocat.png
- welcometocat.png
- yogitocat.png

### Product Card
Each card should include:
- Product image using `next/image` (optimized)
- Product name (derived from filename, formatted nicely)
- Price (generate realistic sticker prices $3-8)
- "Add to Cart" button (non-functional placeholder)

### Navigation
- Add a link to `/products` in the main layout or homepage
